Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Menstruate \Men"stru*ate\, v. i. [imp. & p. p. {Menstruated}; p. pr. & vb. n. {Menstruating}.] To discharge the menses; to have the catamenial flow. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
menstruating \menstruating\ adj. discharging menstrual fluid; -- of women during their menstrual period.
Syn: unwell. [WordNet 1.5]
